title: Drawing, "Sketches. Tents. Bedouin.", possibly 1868, February (probably)
description: Top: a group of tents. Bottom: two standing and a riding Bedouin, all shown from the back. Back of another carrying a bag with his left hand. Top right: two rows of stripes; written beside: "striped / curtain / of tent." Written at left: "arab tents / Bedouin / of Black goats hair".

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches. Tents. Bedouin.", possibly 1868, February (probably).
possibly 1868, February (probably). Pencil. Grey Paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-457.
